lyrics.text:
’Oku fakahā totonu
‘E he Tohi Tapu
‘A e ngaahi ngāue mana,
‘A hotau ‘Otua.

He na’a ne fakatupu,
‘I he kamata’anga;
‘A e langi, mo māmani,
Pea tu’u ma’u pē.

Pea na’e lelei lahi,
‘A e kelekele;
Mo e me’a kotoa pē,
Na’e fakatupu.

Pea toki fakatupu,
‘E hotau ‘Otua,
‘A e sino ‘o ‘Atama,
‘I he kelekele.

Ka ko hono laumālie
Ko e me’a kehe;
He ko e mānava ia,
‘O hotau ‘Otua.

Pea hoko ‘o mo’ui
Hotau tupu’anga;
Pea na’e hoko lelei,
Ki hotau ‘Otua.
